name: Planet Defender (itch) (muhammedamc144)
description:
🔥❤️ Planet Defender Survival Game ❤️🔥

Its Third Person Shooter and Survival Game. Your mission is to survive as much as possible and kill alien creatures on the planet, Collect minerals from the crystals to build constructions and buy different weapons, The aliens come every night and their numbers increase and become harder every night. So be ready to kill them and survive. 👽❤️🔥

Available on Windows PC 🔥
